posts.author: foojin
posts.content: Are Deathless master touch and Undead graft ever useful ? To me it seems the required saves are insanely low (certainly for the touch one).

posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content: As useful as Ki Damage, or even less. You can kill a Kobold with them

posts.author: KailPendragon
posts.content: But luckily for us there's Palemaster Arm PnP Undead Graft Powers with Smart Mode to save us.

posts.author: conlaoch
posts.content:
Assuming the DM of your current persistent world will dish out some Palemaster love.

I'd love to see my current world make the arm powers useful, but I see that as highly unlikely.

Conlaoch
